fool.name: The Fool
fool.uprightMeaning: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit
fool.uprightDescription: The Fool represents new journeys and fresh starts. A time to take a leap of faith and trust in the universe. Embrace your inner child and approach life with wonder and optimism.
fool.reversedDescription: When reversed, The Fool warns against reckless decisions and poor judgment. Take time to think before acting and avoid impulsive behavior that could lead to trouble.

magician.name: The Magician
magician.uprightDescription: The Magician signifies having all the tools needed to succeed. You have the power to manifest your desires through focused will and determination. Channel your energy purposefully.
magician.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Magician suggests misuse of power or inability to harness your potential. Beware of manipulation and focus on developing your skills before taking action.

high_priestess.name: The High Priestess
high_priestess.uprightMeaning: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, subconscious
high_priestess.uprightDescription: The High Priestess represents inner wisdom and intuitive knowledge. Trust your instincts and look beyond the surface. The answers you seek lie within.
high_priestess.reversedDescription: When reversed, you may be ignoring your intuition or hiding important truths. Reconnect with your inner voice and be honest about what you truly know.

empress.name: The Empress
empress.reversedMeaning: Creative block, dependence on others, empty nest
empress.uprightDescription: The Empress embodies feminine power, creativity, and abundance. A time of growth, nurturing, and natural beauty. Your creative projects will flourish.
empress.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Empress may indicate creative blocks or over-dependence on others. Focus on self-care and reconnecting with your creative spark.

emperor.name: The Emperor
emperor.uprightDescription: The Emperor represents structure, authority, and solid foundations. A time to take control, establish order, and provide stable leadership.
emperor.reversedDescription: When reversed, The Emperor warns against being too rigid or controlling. Avoid tyrannical behavior and find balance between authority and compassion.

hierophant.name: The Hierophant
hierophant.uprightMeaning: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition
hierophant.reversedMeaning: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo
hierophant.uprightDescription: The Hierophant represents traditional wisdom and spiritual guidance. Seek knowledge from established institutions and honor time-tested traditions.
hierophant.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Hierophant encourages questioning established beliefs and finding your own spiritual path. Break free from restrictive traditions.

lovers.name: The Lovers
lovers.uprightDescription: The Lovers represents deep connections and harmony in relationships. A time of important choices guided by love and shared values.
lovers.reversedDescription: When reversed, The Lovers indicates relationship conflicts or value misalignment. Work on communication and ensure your actions align with your beliefs.

chariot.name: The Chariot
chariot.uprightDescription: The Chariot signifies victory through determination and focused willpower. Stay disciplined and maintain control to overcome obstacles.
chariot.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Chariot suggests loss of control or conflicting directions. Regain focus and align your actions with your goals.

strength.name: Strength
strength.reversedMeaning: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion
strength.uprightDescription: Strength represents inner courage and gentle power. Face challenges with compassion and patience rather than force. Your gentle approach will prevail.
strength.reversedDescription: When reversed, Strength suggests self-doubt or lack of confidence. Focus on building inner strength and controlling emotional reactions.

hermit.name: The Hermit
hermit.uprightDescription: The Hermit calls for introspection and soul searching. Take time alone to reflect and seek inner wisdom. The answers you need are within.
hermit.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Hermit may indicate excessive isolation or avoiding self-reflection. Balance solitude with connection to others.

wheel_of_fortune.name: Wheel of Fortune
wheel_of_fortune.uprightMeaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, turning point
wheel_of_fortune.reversedMeaning: Bad luck, lack of control, clinging to control, bad luck
wheel_of_fortune.uprightDescription: The Wheel of Fortune represents cycles of change and destiny. A turning point approaches - embrace the changes and trust in the natural flow of life.
wheel_of_fortune.reversedDescription: When reversed, you may be fighting against natural changes or experiencing a streak of bad luck. Accept what you cannot control and adapt.

justice.name: Justice
justice.uprightMeaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
justice.uprightDescription: Justice represents balance, truth, and fair decisions. Act with integrity and take responsibility for your actions. Fair outcomes will prevail.
justice.reversedDescription: Reversed, Justice indicates unfairness or lack of accountability. Examine your actions honestly and work to restore balance.

hanged_man.name: The Hanged Man
hanged_man.uprightDescription: The Hanged Man represents willing sacrifice and new perspectives. Sometimes you must let go and view situations from a different angle to find solutions.
hanged_man.reversedDescription: When reversed, you may be resisting necessary changes or feeling stuck. Stop fighting and allow natural transitions to occur.

death.name: Death
death.reversedMeaning: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging
death.uprightDescription: Death represents transformation and new beginnings. While endings can be difficult, they make way for new growth and opportunities.
death.reversedDescription: Reversed, Death suggests resistance to change or fear of transformation. Embrace the process of renewal and release what no longer serves you.

temperance.name: Temperance
temperance.uprightDescription: Temperance represents balance and moderation. Take a measured approach and blend opposing forces harmoniously. Patience will bring the best results.
temperance.reversedDescription: When reversed, Temperance indicates imbalance or excess. Focus on self-healing and finding your center again.

devil.name: The Devil
devil.reversedMeaning: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment
devil.uprightDescription: The Devil represents bondage to material desires and negative patterns. Recognize what chains you and choose freedom over temptation.
devil.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Devil suggests breaking free from limitations and addictions. You have the power to release yourself from negative patterns.

tower.name: The Tower
tower.uprightMeaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
tower.reversedMeaning: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster
tower.uprightDescription: The Tower represents sudden upheaval and dramatic change. While disruptive, this destruction clears the way for something better to be built.
tower.reversedDescription: When reversed, The Tower suggests internal transformation or successfully avoiding disaster. Use this time to rebuild on stronger foundations.

star.name: The Star
star.reversedMeaning: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection
star.uprightDescription: The Star represents hope, healing, and spiritual guidance. After difficult times, renewal and inspiration return. Trust in the universe's plan.
star.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Star indicates loss of faith or spiritual disconnection. Reconnect with your inner light and trust in better times ahead.

moon.name: The Moon
moon.reversedMeaning: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion
moon.uprightDescription: The Moon represents illusion and the power of the subconscious. Things may not be as they seem - trust your intuition to navigate uncertainty.
moon.reversedDescription: When reversed, The Moon suggests releasing fears and confronting illusions. Face your anxieties and trust your inner wisdom.

sun.name: The Sun
sun.reversedMeaning: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic
sun.uprightDescription: The Sun represents joy, success, and positive energy. A time of celebration and happiness. Let your inner light shine brightly.
sun.reversedDescription: Reversed, The Sun may indicate dampened spirits or false optimism. Reconnect with your inner child and find genuine reasons for joy.

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.reversedMeaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call, harsh judgement
judgement.uprightDescription: Judgement represents rebirth and answering your higher calling. A time of awakening and making important decisions about your life's direction.
judgement.reversedDescription: When reversed, Judgement suggests self-doubt or ignoring your inner calling. Be gentle with yourself and listen to your higher purpose.

world.name: The World
world.reversedMeaning: Seeking personal closure, short-cut to success, lack of achievement
world.uprightDescription: The World represents completion and achievement. You've reached an important milestone and can celebrate your accomplishments. New cycles await.
world.reversedDescription: Reversed, The World suggests incomplete goals or seeking shortcuts. Focus on finishing what you've started before moving to new ventures.

ace.name: Ace of Wands
ace.reversedMeaning: Lack of energy, delays, creative blocks
ace.uprightDescription: A spark of creative inspiration and new beginnings. Raw potential and passionate energy are available to fuel your ventures.
ace.reversedDescription: Creative blocks or delays in new projects. The energy is there but may need time to develop properly.

two.name: Two of Wands
two.uprightMeaning: Future planning, making decisions, leaving comfort zone
two.reversedMeaning: Fear of change, lack of planning, bad planning
two.uprightDescription: Planning for the future and making important decisions. You have the power to shape your destiny through careful planning.
two.reversedDescription: Fear of change or poor planning may hinder progress. Take time to properly prepare before moving forward.

three.name: Three of Wands
three.reversedMeaning: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays
three.uprightDescription: Expansion and growth opportunities await. Your foresight and planning will lead to success in new ventures.
three.reversedDescription: Playing it too safe or lacking vision may limit opportunities. Be bolder in your approach.

four.name: Four of Wands
four.reversedMeaning: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others
four.uprightDescription: A time of celebration and achievement. Your hard work has paid off and you can enjoy the fruits of your labor with loved ones.
four.reversedDescription: Focus on personal satisfaction rather than external validation. Inner peace matters more than others' approval.

five.name: Five of Wands
five.reversedMeaning: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, releasing tension
five.uprightDescription: Competition and conflict arise, but this struggle leads to growth. Stand your ground while remaining open to different perspectives.
five.reversedDescription: Internal struggles need attention. Avoid conflict for the sake of peace, but don't ignore important issues.

six.name: Six of Wands
six.reversedMeaning: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace
six.uprightDescription: Victory and recognition come after overcoming challenges. Your confidence and leadership inspire others to follow.
six.reversedDescription: Success may be more private or personal. Define achievement on your own terms rather than seeking external validation.

seven.name: Seven of Wands
seven.uprightDescription: Stand your ground against opposition. Your perseverance and determination will help you maintain your position.
seven.reversedDescription: Feeling overwhelmed by challenges. It may be time to reassess your position and conserve your energy.

eight.name: Eight of Wands
eight.uprightMeaning: Speed, swift action, rapid progress, movement
eight.reversedMeaning: Delays, frustration, resisting change, internal alignment
eight.uprightDescription: Things move quickly now. Swift action and rapid progress lead to exciting developments. Strike while the iron is hot.
eight.reversedDescription: Delays and frustrations slow your progress. Use this time for internal reflection and planning.

nine.name: Nine of Wands
nine.uprightMeaning: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith
nine.uprightDescription: You're close to achieving your goal despite obstacles. Draw on your inner strength and keep pushing forward.
nine.reversedDescription: Exhaustion and defensive attitudes may hinder progress. Take time to rebuild your strength and confidence.

ten.name: Ten of Wands
ten.uprightMeaning: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
ten.reversedMeaning: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release
ten.uprightDescription: Heavy responsibilities weigh you down, but completion is near. The burden will be worth the final achievement.
ten.reversedDescription: Consider delegating responsibilities or releasing what no longer serves you. You don't have to carry everything alone.

page.name: Page of Wands
page.uprightMeaning: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit
page.reversedMeaning: Newly formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs
page.uprightDescription: Fresh inspiration and creative potential await exploration. Embrace your adventurous spirit and try new things.
page.reversedDescription: New ideas are forming but need more development. Address self-limiting beliefs that hold you back.

knight.name: Knight of Wands
knight.uprightMeaning: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
knight.reversedMeaning: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays
knight.uprightDescription: Passionate energy drives bold action. Your enthusiasm is contagious, but temper impulsiveness with wisdom.
knight.reversedDescription: Scattered energy leads to delays. Focus your passion on one meaningful project rather than spreading yourself thin.

queen.name: Queen of Wands
queen.uprightMeaning: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination
queen.uprightDescription: Confident leadership and social grace attract others. Your independence and determination inspire confidence in others.
queen.reversedDescription: Focus on rebuilding self-confidence from within. Sometimes introversion helps you reconnect with your true power.

king.name: King of Wands
king.uprightDescription: Strong leadership and clear vision guide successful ventures. Your entrepreneurial spirit creates opportunities for others.
king.reversedDescription: Impulsive decisions and high expectations may alienate others. Balance ambition with compassion and patience.

ace.name: Ace of Cups
ace.uprightDescription: New emotional beginnings and an open heart. Love, creativity, and spiritual connections flow freely.
ace.reversedDescription: Focus on self-love and addressing repressed emotions. Inner healing is needed before external relationships can flourish.

two.name: Two of Cups
two.uprightDescription: Deep emotional connection and partnership. Mutual respect and understanding create strong bonds.
two.reversedDescription: Relationship challenges or the need to focus on self-love. Work on internal harmony before seeking external connections.

three.name: Three of Cups
three.uprightDescription: Celebration and joy with friends and community. Creative collaborations and social connections bring happiness.
three.reversedDescription: Need for independence or time alone. Creative blocks may require solitary reflection to overcome.

four.name: Four of Cups
four.reversedMeaning: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in with yourself
four.uprightDescription: A time for contemplation and inner reflection. New opportunities may not interest you as you reassess your values.
four.reversedDescription: Deep introspection leads to important realizations. Trust your need for solitude and self-examination.

five.name: Five of Cups
five.uprightDescription: Disappointment and loss bring sadness, but hope remains. Focus on what can still be salvaged rather than what's lost.
five.reversedDescription: Beginning to heal from disappointment. Self-forgiveness opens the door to new possibilities.

six.name: Six of Cups
six.uprightMeaning: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy
six.reversedMeaning: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness
six.uprightDescription: Nostalgic connections and innocent joy return. Childhood memories or old friends bring comfort and happiness.
six.reversedDescription: Let go of past hurts and embrace forgiveness. Reconnect with your playful, innocent nature.

seven.name: Seven of Cups
seven.reversedMeaning: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices
seven.uprightDescription: Many options create confusion and unrealistic expectations. Ground your dreams in practical reality.
seven.reversedDescription: Clarity emerges about what truly matters. Align your choices with your authentic values and priorities.

eight.name: Eight of Cups
eight.reversedMeaning: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting
eight.uprightDescription: Walking away from unfulfilling situations requires courage. Trust your instincts about when it's time to move on.
eight.reversedDescription: Uncertainty about leaving prevents forward movement. Take time to clarify what you truly want.

nine.name: Nine of Cups
nine.uprightDescription: Emotional fulfillment and satisfaction with life's blessings. Your wishes are coming true through grateful acceptance.
nine.reversedDescription: True happiness comes from within rather than external achievements. Look beyond material success for fulfillment.

ten.name: Ten of Cups
ten.uprightMeaning: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment
ten.uprightDescription: Perfect emotional harmony and blessed relationships. Your values align with those you love most.
ten.reversedDescription: Relationship challenges stem from misaligned values. Work on reconnecting with what truly matters to you and others.

page.name: Page of Cups
page.uprightMeaning: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, possibility
page.reversedMeaning: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks
page.uprightDescription: Intuitive messages and creative opportunities arrive. Trust your emotional wisdom and artistic inspirations.
page.reversedDescription: Self-doubt blocks creative flow. Trust your intuitive insights even when logic argues against them.

knight.name: Knight of Cups
knight.uprightDescription: Romantic adventures and creative pursuits capture your imagination. Follow your heart with passionate dedication.
knight.reversedDescription: Fantasy overshadows reality. Ground your romantic and creative dreams in practical action.

queen.name: Queen of Cups
queen.uprightDescription: Deep compassion and emotional wisdom guide your relationships. Your intuitive nature provides comfort to others.
queen.reversedDescription: Focus on emotional self-care and inner healing. You cannot pour from an empty cup.

king.name: King of Cups
king.uprightDescription: Emotional maturity and compassionate leadership create harmony. Your diplomatic skills resolve conflicts peacefully.
king.reversedDescription: Emotional volatility disrupts relationships. Practice self-compassion and emotional regulation.

ace.name: Ace of Swords
ace.uprightDescription: Mental breakthrough and clarity of thought. Truth cuts through confusion, bringing new understanding and insight.
ace.reversedDescription: Mental confusion or harsh truths that are difficult to accept. Take time to process new information carefully.

two.name: Two of Swords
two.uprightDescription: A difficult decision requires careful consideration. Weigh your options thoughtfully before choosing a path forward.
two.reversedDescription: Overwhelmed by choices or avoiding a necessary decision. Seek clarity and trust your intuition.

three.name: Three of Swords
three.uprightDescription: Emotional pain and heartbreak are part of the healing process. Allow yourself to grieve and process these difficult feelings.
three.reversedDescription: Beginning to heal from emotional wounds. Recovery is possible through self-care and time.

four.name: Four of Swords
four.uprightDescription: Rest and recuperation restore your mental energy. Take time for peaceful contemplation and healing reflection.
four.reversedDescription: Mental exhaustion requires deeper rest. Don't rush back into action before you're truly ready.

five.name: Five of Swords
five.uprightMeaning: Conflict, disagreements, competition, defeat, winning at all costs
five.uprightDescription: Victory comes at a cost when achieved through conflict. Consider whether winning is worth the damage to relationships.
five.reversedDescription: Time to make amends and heal past conflicts. Reconciliation requires humility and genuine effort.

six.name: Six of Swords
six.uprightMeaning: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage
six.reversedMeaning: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business
six.uprightDescription: A difficult but necessary transition leads to calmer waters. Leave behind what no longer serves your journey.
six.reversedDescription: Internal resistance makes change more difficult. Address unfinished business before moving forward.

seven.name: Seven of Swords
seven.uprightMeaning: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, acting strategically
seven.uprightDescription: Strategic thinking and careful planning help you navigate difficult situations, but beware of deceptive tactics.
seven.reversedDescription: Self-doubt and imposter syndrome undermine confidence. Be honest with yourself about your capabilities.

eight.name: Eight of Swords
eight.uprightMeaning: Negative thinking, restricted freedom, imprisonment, victim mentality
eight.reversedMeaning: Self-limiting beliefs, inner critic, releasing negative thoughts
eight.uprightDescription: Mental restrictions and negative thinking create unnecessary limitations. You have more freedom than you realize.
eight.reversedDescription: Recognizing self-limiting beliefs is the first step to freedom. Challenge your inner critic with compassion.

nine.name: Nine of Swords
nine.reversedMeaning: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing anxiety
nine.uprightDescription: Anxiety and worry consume your thoughts, but many fears are worse in imagination than reality. Seek support and perspective.
nine.reversedDescription: Deep fears surface for healing. Face your shadows with courage and professional support if needed.

ten.name: Ten of Swords
ten.uprightMeaning: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis
ten.reversedMeaning: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end
ten.uprightDescription: A painful ending marks the completion of a difficult cycle. Rock bottom becomes the foundation for rebuilding.
ten.reversedDescription: Beginning to recover from devastating loss. Allow yourself to heal at your own pace.

page.name: Page of Swords
page.uprightMeaning: New ideas, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, new ways of communicating
page.reversedMeaning: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haste
page.uprightDescription: Intellectual curiosity and new ideas energize your thinking. Communicate your insights with enthusiasm and clarity.
page.reversedDescription: Ideas without action lead nowhere. Focus your mental energy on practical applications of your insights.

knight.name: Knight of Swords
knight.uprightMeaning: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, fast thinking
knight.uprightDescription: Ambitious drive and quick thinking propel you toward goals. Channel your mental energy into focused action.
knight.reversedDescription: Scattered energy and lack of direction hinder progress. Take time to clarify your priorities and plans.

queen.name: Queen of Swords
queen.uprightMeaning: Independent, unbiased judgement, clear boundaries, direct communication
queen.reversedMeaning: Overly-emotional, easily influenced, harsh judgement, lack of empathy
queen.uprightDescription: Clear thinking and direct communication cut through confusion. Your independent judgment serves truth and justice.
queen.reversedDescription: Emotional reactions cloud judgment. Practice empathy while maintaining healthy boundaries.

king.name: King of Swords
king.uprightMeaning: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth
king.reversedMeaning: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation
king.uprightDescription: Intellectual authority and clear reasoning guide wise decisions. Your pursuit of truth serves the greater good.
king.reversedDescription: Power without wisdom becomes manipulation. Use your intellectual gifts to serve rather than dominate others.

ace.name: Ace of Pentacles
ace.reversedMeaning: Lost opportunity, lack of planning, poor financial decisions
ace.uprightDescription: New opportunities for material success and prosperity. A solid foundation for future abundance is being established.
ace.reversedDescription: Missed opportunities or poor financial planning. Review your approach to material resources and security.

two.name: Two of Pentacles
two.uprightDescription: Juggling multiple responsibilities requires balance and flexibility. Prioritize what's most important and adapt as needed.
two.reversedDescription: Feeling overwhelmed by too many commitments. It's time to reorganize and focus on what truly matters.

three.name: Three of Pentacles
three.uprightDescription: Successful collaboration and skill development. Working with others creates better results than going alone.
three.reversedDescription: Team conflicts or preferring to work independently. Ensure everyone is aligned on goals and methods.

four.name: Four of Pentacles
four.uprightMeaning: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control
four.uprightDescription: Financial security through careful saving and conservative choices. Balance prudence with generosity and growth.
four.reversedDescription: Excessive control or greed blocks abundance. Find balance between security and sharing your resources.

five.name: Five of Pentacles
five.uprightMeaning: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry
five.uprightDescription: Financial or emotional poverty creates feelings of isolation. Remember that help is available if you reach out.
five.reversedDescription: Beginning to recover from hardship. Accept help graciously and focus on spiritual rather than material wealth.

six.name: Six of Pentacles
six.uprightDescription: Generous sharing creates abundance for all. Give and receive with gratitude and mutual respect.
six.reversedDescription: Ensure charity flows both ways. Take care of your own needs before constantly giving to others.

seven.name: Seven of Pentacles
seven.uprightMeaning: Long-term view, sustainable results, perseverance, investment
seven.reversedMeaning: Lack of long-term vision, limited success, impatience
seven.uprightDescription: Patient investment and long-term thinking yield sustainable results. Persevere through slow but steady progress.
seven.reversedDescription: Impatience undermines long-term success. Develop a clearer vision for sustainable growth.

eight.name: Eight of Pentacles
eight.uprightMeaning: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development
eight.uprightDescription: Dedicated practice and attention to detail develop true mastery. Focus on craftsmanship over speed.
eight.reversedDescription: Distractions or perfectionism hinder skill development. Find balance between excellence and progress.

nine.name: Nine of Pentacles
nine.uprightDescription: Financial independence and luxury come through disciplined effort. Enjoy the fruits of your labor with gratitude.
nine.reversedDescription: Success feels hollow without inner fulfillment. Remember that your worth isn't determined by achievement alone.

ten.name: Ten of Pentacles
ten.uprightMeaning: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution
ten.reversedMeaning: The dark side of wealth, financial failure, loneliness
ten.uprightDescription: Generational wealth and long-term security benefit your entire family. Your success contributes to collective prosperity.
ten.reversedDescription: Material success without meaning feels empty. Focus on relationships and legacy beyond financial achievement.

page.name: Page of Pentacles
page.reversedMeaning: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure
page.uprightDescription: New opportunities for financial or skill development appear. Approach learning with enthusiasm and dedication.
page.reversedDescription: Procrastination or fear of failure blocks progress. Learn from setbacks and maintain momentum toward your goals.

knight.name: Knight of Pentacles
knight.uprightMeaning: Hard work, productivity, routine, conservatism, methodical
knight.uprightDescription: Steady, methodical work produces reliable results. Your conservative approach ensures stable progress.
knight.reversedDescription: Rigid routines may feel stifling. Balance discipline with flexibility and inject creativity into your work.

queen.name: Queen of Pentacles
queen.uprightMeaning: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent
queen.uprightDescription: Practical nurturing creates abundance for yourself and others. Your care provides both emotional and material security.
queen.reversedDescription: Balance caring for others with your own needs. Financial independence strengthens your ability to help.

king.name: King of Pentacles
king.reversedMeaning: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth and status, stubborn
king.uprightDescription: Disciplined effort and wise investments create lasting abundance. Your success enables generosity and security for others.
king.reversedDescription: Obsession with wealth or status corrupts true success. Remember that the best things in life cannot be bought.
